00025 #ifndef _ROBOT_CONTROL_KINEMATICS_UNDERDETERMINEDSYSTEMSOLVER_
00026 #define _ROBOT_CONTROL_KINEMATICS_UNDERDETERMINEDSYSTEMSOLVER_
00027 
00028 #include <robot/control/kinematics/kinematics>
00029 
00030 #include <base/ReferencedObject>
00031 
00032 
00033 namespace robot {
00034 namespace control {
00035 namespace kinematics {
00036 
00037 
00038 /// Abstract interface to Solvers for under-determined matrix systems. 
00039 /**
00040  *  Different solution methods are embodied via subclass implementations.
00041  *  Depending on the solution method, a single solution Vector may be
00042  *   returned or a set of Vectors that span the solution space.
00043  *  (e.g. MPPseudoInvSolver gives a single solution determined via 
00044  *        the Moorse-Penrose pseudo inverse, and FullSpaceSolver
00045  *        gives a set of orthogonal Vectors spanning the solution space)
00046  */
00047 class UnderdeterminedSystemSolver : public base::ReferencedObject
00048 {
00049 public:
00050   /// For Ax=b, solves for the solution(s) x.
00051   /** @return a Matrix whos columns represent the set of vectors
00052    *            that span a sub-space of the solution space.
00053    *            This could be the entire solution space, 
00054    *            or just a single solution (hence column).
00055    */
00056   virtual Matrix solve(const Matrix& A, const Vector& b) = 0;
00057 
00058 };
00059 
00060 
00061 } // namespace kinematics
00062 } // namespace control
00063 } // namespace robot
00064 
00065 #endif
